body.raw:
<?xml version="1.0"?>
<payment>
    <mode>default</mode>
    <currency>BRL</currency>
    <notificationURL>https://sualoja.com.br/notifica.html</notificationURL>
    <receiverEmail>suporte@lojamodelo.com.br</receiverEmail>
    <sender>
        <hash>{{{{sender_hash}}</hash>
        <email>comprador@sandbox.pagseguro.com.br</email>
        <phone>
            <areaCode>99</areaCode>
            <number>99999999</number>
        </phone>
        <bornDate>01/01/1900</bornDate>
        <documents>
            <document>
                <type>CPF</type>
                <value>11475714734</value>
            </document>
        </documents>
        <name>Jose Comprador</name>
    </sender>
    <items>
        <item>
            <id>0001</id>
            <description>Produto PagSeguroI</description>
            <amount>99999.99</amount>
            <quantity>1</quantity>
        </item>
    </items>
    <reference>REF1234</reference>
    <shipping>
        <address>
            <street>Av. PagSeguro</street>
            <number>9999</number>
            <complement>99o andar</complement>
            <district>Jardim Internet</district>
            <city>Cidade Exemplo</city>
            <state>SP</state>
            <country>BRA</country>
            <postalCode>99999999</postalCode>
        </address>
        <type>1</type>
        <cost>1.00</cost>
        <addressRequired>true</addressRequired>
    </shipping>
    <extraAmount>1.00</extraAmount>
    <method>credit_card</method>
    <creditCard>
        <token>{{creditCardToken}}</token>
        <installment>
            <quantity>1</quantity>
            <noInterestInstallmentQuantity>2</noInterestInstallmentQuantity>
            <value>99999.99</value>
        </installment>
        <holder>
            <name>Jose Comprador</name>
            <documents>
                <document>
                    <type>CPF</type>
                    <value>11475714734</value>
                </document>
            </documents>
            <birthDate>01/01/1900</birthDate>
            <phone>
                <areaCode>99</areaCode>
                <number>99999999</number>
            </phone>
        </holder>
        <billingAddress>
            <street>Av. PagSeguro</street>
            <number>9999</number>
            <complement>99o andar</complement>
            <district>Jardim Internet</district>
            <city>Cidade Exemplo</city>
            <state>SP</state>
            <country>BRA</country>
            <postalCode>99999999</postalCode>
        </billingAddress>
    </creditCard>
    <bank>
        <name>bancodobrasil</name>
    </bank>
    <dynamicPaymentMethodMessage>
        <creditCard>Minha loja</creditCard>
        <boleto>Minha loja</boleto>
    </dynamicPaymentMethodMessage>
    <promoCode>PROMOCODE_PAGSEGURO</promoCode>
</payment>

item.name: Consulta de Transações histórico de transações
Consultando uma autorização pelo código de notificação
Consultando uma autorização pelo código de notificação

body.raw:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="iso-8859-1" standalone="yes"?>
<payment>
  <mode>default</mode>
  <method>boleto</method>
  <sender>
    <name>Wisdom da Silva</name>
    <email>wisdom@testeteste.com.br</email>
    <phone>
      <areaCode>11</areaCode>
      <number>28845884</number>
    </phone>
    <documents>
      <document>
        <type>CPF</type>
        <value>05415742565</value>
      </document>
    </documents>
    <hash>{{sender_hash}}</hash>
  </sender>
  <currency>BRL</currency>
  <notificationURL>https://che444ckout.upfy.com.br/AtualizaStatusPedidoPagSeguro</notificationURL>
  <items>
    <item>
      <id>54</id>
      <description>Curso sobre Música</description>
      <quantity>1</quantity>
      <amount>159.90</amount>
    </item>
  </items>
  <extraAmount>0.00</extraAmount>
  <reference>UP00000071</reference>
  <shipping>
  <addressRequired>false</addressRequired>
  </shipping>
  <receivers>
    <receiver>
      <publicKey>PUB08B6D06572834254AE79E620CC876ED9</publicKey>
      <split>
        <amount>44.77</amount>
      </split>
    </receiver>
  </receivers>
</payment>
